column4: slart: im slowly getting rid of windows on my internet shop thats why i'n trying to install ubuntu 1 by 1 so that my customers will experience using ubuntu, for the meantime they are going to print on windows
i have an hp deskjet 2460 what driver should i select if ubuntu promps me?
do you actually have a network printer (a printer connected directory to the network) or is it a local (USB/parallel/serial) printer attached to a Windows system?
